module.title: The Sovereign Soul
module.subtitle: Identifying Your Light
module.description: Before we get into the technicals, we gotta anchor your spirit. You aren't just a cog in a machine; you're a sovereign soul.

lessons.title: Your Holy Ambition
lessons.description: Write down one 'Holy Ambition'—something you want to achieve that helps someone else.
lessons.detailedDescription:
Listen, mate, before we get into the technicals, we gotta anchor your spirit. You aren't just a cog in a machine; you're a sovereign soul.

Your Task: Write down one 'Holy Ambition'—something you want to achieve that helps someone else. Whether it's providing for your kin, teaching a neighbor, or building something that serves the community, name it. Once you name it, you own it. That's your North Star for this whole platform.

spiral.description: Active, flowing energy. Rapid updates and dynamic engagement.

barredSpiral.description: Structured, linear progression. Central bar to channel energy.

elliptical.description: Low-gas, high-wisdom. Mentorship markers for legacy users.

irregular.description: Flexible, adaptive. No defined shape yet - transformation in progress.

nextSteps.description: Name your North Star. Once you name it, you own it.

communityFeed.content: 'North Star' in the Sovereign Soul module
80% lighter. The path is clear for everyone.
Energy + Love = We All Win. 2,500 hearts now beating as one in the circle.
